title: LOM Retirement | B2B Basic Integration to M-APIs
description:
Description
The objective of this portfolio epic is to support the creation the basic integration of B2B to M-API in order to be able to place an order for an easy B2B product.
Company Start / Pro
Business DSL / Glasfaser Start / Pro
An overview of the to do's can be found here:
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2291925353#Business&PortfolioEpicsB2B/DOTIntegrationviaMAPIs-B2BBasicIntegrationtoM-APIs(techn.breakthrough)&NewAcquisitionforEasyB2BProductwithoutframeagreement
